entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times late this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
